synopsis.text: Losing herself in the hustle of a bustling metropolis, Lin, a dedicated artist, works tirelessly at an animation firm to realize her dreams. Caught up in her new project's demanding schedule, she finds herself unable to respond to her father's messages. As the pressure mounts, her creative wellspring runs dry, leaving her unable to even hold a pencil. Overwhelmed by self-doubt, Lin seeks solace in her hometown. It is here that she stumbles upon a childhood sketchbook, rekindling her passion for art and reigniting her determination to chase her dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
